positive.review: If someone is looking for a simple strategy game to play with a group of friends then this is for you. Round up your friends, everyone download ( it't free) for an alliance and play together. Great fun for everyone.

Man see castle 
Man see conquest
Man see fire
Man install
... 
Some 100+ hours into game
Man like
тема

A very well designed city-building game that I used to play on mobile and came back to out of nostalgia. There's something about starting over from scratch, watching your resources and buildings accumulate, and sorting through random equipment and rewards that's always been relaxing for me, especially if there's chill medieval bard music in the background. I've played other games like this before (and spent regrettable amounts on them before) so I know the score when it comes to playing competitively. Since that's not my intention here, I'm actually finding it a great game to spend my study breaks on every now and then. 

(Note: I do wish there was some champion customization since I'm tired of Gwyneth's lackluster hairstyle, especially with UE 5 entering the mix recently! And fullscreen isn't actually fullscreen; on my PC at least, it's a tiny borderless window docked in the upper left corner, whereas unchecking the "fullscreen" option and maximizing the resulting window actually gets it done.)

If someone is looking for a simple strategy game to play with a group of friends then this is for you. Round up your friends, everyone download ( it't free) for an alliance and play together. Great fun for everyone.

Man see castle 
Man see conquest
Man see fire
Man install
... 
Some 100+ hours into game
Man like

Game play and story are great, game has a few issues, but don't they all? If not playing with a credit card, it does take a bit longer to upgrade but is possible to have a strong and powerful castle, but if you are a active player rewards are good
тема

negative.review: Useless game. Money hungry developers. Bad customer care. Avoid the game at all cost

As many others before me i will also say it, avoid this game like the plague.

It's like the million other similar mobile games that exist on steam, whatever you build (buildings, army, etc.) takes time from the modest 2 minutes at the start to 200 years on late game, unless you pay 5000 gold coins that you bought for 5000 euros. Also when you quit the game and you go to sleep happy with the progress you have done only to realize next morning when you open the game 5 notifications telling you that other players attacked you, killed all your soldiers and stolen all your resources and you are left with nothing, yeah..... good stuff right there.

Well my verdict as usual is that this game will take it's negative vote and be happy about it.
I played it and found that the layout wasn't good or user-friendly. The game play of troops fighting is a bit dumb. Better play similar war games.
The game requires money and its developers will squeeze every penny out of you. Bullying is rampant amongst players.
Useless game. Money hungry developers. Bad customer care. Avoid the game at all cost

Also when you quit the game and you go to sleep happy with the progress you have done only to realize next morning when you open the game 5 notifications telling you that other players attacked you, killed all your soldiers and stolen all your resources and you are left with nothing, yeah..... good stuff right there.

Well my verdict as usual is that this game will take it's negative vote and be happy about it.
I played it and found that the layout wasn't good or user-friendly. The game play of troops fighting is a bit dumb. Better play similar war games.
this is a pay to play game. you can not compete in a fair fight without spending money to massively boost your stats.
pay to play

My progress has been reset in 2 of they P2W games.
The game requires money and its developers will squeeze every penny out of you. Bullying is rampant amongst players.
Useless game. Money hungry developers. Bad customer care. Avoid the game at all cost

As many others before me i will also say it, avoid this game like the plague.

It's like the million other similar mobile games that exist on steam, whatever you build (buildings, army, etc.) takes time from the modest 2 minutes at the start to 200 years on late game, unless you pay 5000 gold coins that you bought for 5000 euros. Also when you quit the game and you go to sleep happy with the progress you have done only to realize next morning when you open the game 5 notifications telling you that other players attacked you, killed all your soldiers and stolen all your resources and you are left with nothing, yeah..... good stuff right there.

Well my verdict as usual is that this game will take it's negative vote and be happy about it.
I played it and found that the layout wasn't good or user-friendly. The game play of troops fighting is a bit dumb. Better play similar war games.
